mapper.sql: SELECT t.ticketing_at, t.ticketing_id, t.play_name, t.viewing_at, t.ticketing_cnt, (SELECT cc.comn_code_name FROM comn_code cc WHERE cc.comn_code_id = t.ticketing_status) AS ticketing_status FROM ticketing t
mapper.select:
select count(*) from ticketing t where true
AND t.ticketing_status IN ('Y', 'N')
AND t.ticketing_status = 'Y'
AND t.ticketing_status = 'N'
AND t.ticketing_at between DATE_FORMAT(#{start_date} , '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM ( SELECT t.ticketing_id FROM ticketing t JOIN play p ON t.play_name = p.play_name WHERE true
AND p.play_middle_cat IN ('공연', '콘서트', '전시', '뮤지컬')
AND p.play_middle_cat = '뮤지컬'
AND p.play_middle_cat = '콘서트'
AND p.play_middle_cat = '전시'
AND p.play_middle_cat = '공연'
AND t.ticketing_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{start_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{end_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND t.play_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
GROUP BY t.ticketing_id ) AS ticket_count;

SELECT t.ticketing_at, t.ticketing_id, t.play_name, t.viewing_at, t.ticketing_cnt, (SELECT cc.comn_code_name FROM comn_code cc WHERE cc.comn_code_id = t.ticketing_status) AS ticketing_status FROM ticketing t WHERE true
AND t.ticketing_status IN ('Y', 'N')
AND t.ticketing_status = 'Y'
AND t.ticketing_status = 'N'
AND t.ticketing_at between DATE_FORMAT(#{start_date} , '%Y-%m-%d') and DATE_FORMAT(#{end_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
ORDER BY ticketing_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset};
mapper.insert: insert into ticketing ( ticketing_id, ticketing_at, ticketing_cnt, ticketing_status, showing_info, showing_date, cancelable_at, play_price, stage_name, choice_show_seat, ticketing_price, user_name, user_id, viewing_at, play_name, created_at, created_id, updated_at, updated_id ) VALUES ( #{ticketing_id}, #{ticketing_at}, #{ticketing_cnt}, #{ticketing_status}, #{showing_info}, #{showing_date}, current_timestamp, #{play_price}, #{stage_name}, #{choice_show_seat}, #{ticketing_price}, #{user_name}, #{user_id}, current_timestamp, #{play_name}, current_timestamp, #{created_id}, current_timestamp, #{updated_id} )
mapper.select:
SELECT t.ticketing_id, MAX(t.ticketing_at) AS ticketing_at, MAX(t.stage_name) AS stage_name, MAX(t.choice_show_seat) AS choice_show_seat, MAX(p.play_middle_cat) AS play_middle_cat, MAX(t.play_name) AS play_name FROM ticketing t JOIN play p ON t.play_name = p.play_name WHERE true
AND p.play_middle_cat IN ('공연', '콘서트', '전시', '뮤지컬')
AND p.play_middle_cat = '뮤지컬'
AND p.play_middle_cat = '콘서트'
AND p.play_middle_cat = '전시'
AND p.play_middle_cat = '공연'
AND t.ticketing_at BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{start_date}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{end_date}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND t.play_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
GROUP BY t.ticketing_id ORDER BY ticketing_at DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset};

SELECT t.ticketing_at, t.user_name, t.viewing_at, t.stage_name, t.ticketing_id, t.play_name, t.viewing_at, t.ticketing_cnt, t.choice_show_seat, (SELECT cc.comn_code_name FROM comn_code cc WHERE cc.comn_code_id = t.ticketing_status) AS ticketing_status FROM ticketing t WHERE t.ticketing_id = #{ticketing_id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (user_id, coupon_id, created_at, created_id, updated_at, updated_id) SELECT '사용자 ID 값' AS user_id, c.coupon_id, current_timestamp AS created_at, '생성자 ID 값' AS created_id, current_timestamp AS updated_at, '생성자 ID 값' AS updated_id FROM Coupon c WHERE -- 특정 조건을 여기에 추가, 예를 들어 쿠폰 이름이 '특정 쿠폰 이름'인 경우 c.coupon_name = '특정 쿠폰 이름' LIMIT 1;
